website_summaries.verdict: These bars fit many name-brand grills without the name-brand price tag.
pros: Normally magnetic due to martensic structure and iron content
cons: Metal gauge may be a little thinner than expected

customer_reviews.title: Measure before you order!
customer_reviews.text: These aftermarket flavorizer bars seem high quality. I rated them 4 stars rather than 5 because the long-term durability can't yet be determined. When placing my order, I threw common sense to the wind and ordered the bars according to model number instead of physical measurement. They were the wrong size for my pit. I had to return them at my expense, which is only fair. Please be forewarned. Don't make my dumb mistake! Measure your existing bars before ordering new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nettiejay

customer_reviews.title: Look like good quality parts - Heavier gauge steel
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the corroded bars on my weber genesis. This seems to need to be done every 2 years regardless of the manufacturer. These bars seem very nice, highly polished stainless steel will make your grill look brand new. They are heavier gauge steel than the weber OEM parts. For the price, I don't think you can beat them. Not expecting a lifetime of use from these, so in 2 years, I will probably buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Work Like A Charm
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good price for stainless steel flavorizer bars. They look great and fit right in with no issue in my 2010 Weber Genesis E 310 with side burner controls. Im very happy to have switched over to stainless bars over the porcelain bars. Stainless steel grates and bars look and cook so much better than cast iron and porcelain enamel grates and bars
customer_reviews.author: SportsmanNH

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: have had them for 3 weeks now. Not the same as porcelain coated(these are just stainless steel) heat well and in fact glow red hot which helps distribute the heat and improve cooking process. But they discolor and tarnish quickly and drippings stick all over.
customer_reviews.author: tod bogdanoff

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones to get!!!
customer_reviews.text: The flavorizer bars on my old grill were so old and rusty, they were falling apart. After searching and reading several reviews on Amazon, I decided to buy these and I have to say I can't be more pleased! They fit my Weber Genesis grill perfectly. Best of it all, because of their low price, I also upgraded my old rusty grates as well! Piece of advice, to ensure a great fit, measure your old bars prior to placing your order.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Work Well
customer_reviews.text: Replace enameled bar with these stainless ones. They are about a year old now and still work great. I also don't need to worry about chipping enamel with these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good replacements
customer_reviews.text: These replaced some 5-year old flavorizors, and my grill is now cooking evenly again without flare ups. They lose their stainless color after a few grillings, but they still work as intended. I hope to keep these another 5 years. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mogg

customer_reviews.title: Good deal no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Weber spirit 210 knowing they are too long, cut them fairly easy using tin snips and a angle grinder using the old ones as templates. Work well plus have complete extra set now since I only needed three, with the two extra ones plus I took the pieces I cut off and overlapped two together and attached with sheet metal screws.Wound up with four extra by ordering five and salvaging the cut pieces.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, half the price of Weber website. Heavy duty stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: These flavor bars are amazing. Nice upgrade for my Weber grill. Glad I bought them
customer_reviews.author: deborah cole

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these are the highest grade grilll replacement parts you can buy. Far better than the original. Very heavy duty stainless steel. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sbrag

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged and protected. Each bar wrapped in in plastic protector. All looked and fit great into my Weber. Performance thus far has been perfect. Between this and the updgraded stainless steel grill grates, feel like I have a brand new grill again.
customer_reviews.author: busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Work well!
customer_reviews.text: They look great for the first 9 seconds on the grill, so don't get too attached to the appearance, but they seem to do their job on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: A Dad

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement and nice price
customer_reviews.text: These replaced my old flavorizer bars, which had crumbled in my old Weber Grill. This will enable me to use my grill for many more years, without having to spend a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: good fit, works well for mulching leaves.
customer_reviews.text: good fit and works well. I don't think they are as durable as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit on my older Weber Grill
customer_reviews.text: I was glad that I could still get new ones for my aging Weber grill. This fit in very well and serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2010 Weber genesis grill perfect. They are 20 gauge, a little thin but price is excellent. I'm happy with it. This is the first time I changed my original flavor bars since 2010.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fi - Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My original weber flavorizers were rusted through. These fit perfectly and we're much cheaper. No reason to buy the Weber original parts when these work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Jones

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: My only concern is how long these will last but these fit perfectly in my Weber grill and look great. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ramsdell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great replacement, fit my weber grill perfect. 24.5 inches long..be careful the metal edges are sharp.
customer_reviews.author: narn

customer_reviews.title: as they would be perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a review on the product quality, as they would be perfect for the price, but like other, I received 26" bars instead of the 24.5" that I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Pizza Roll Chef

customer_reviews.title: seems good but needs alterations
customer_reviews.text: The product is a good price; however, you have to cut the bars to length. If you don't have the cutters (and strength) to do it, you may have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Work better than the original Weber Flavor bars that rusted out
customer_reviews.text: Work better than the original Weber Flavor bars that rusted out. It is important to measure your flavor bars and make sure you order the right ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Second set is the correct length and works great!
customer_reviews.text: First set was the wrong length, either mismarked or mispicked. Second set is the correct length and works great!
customer_reviews.author: OneEyedGupy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item for far less than OEM. The metal gauge is a bit thin, otherwise it would be 5 stars all the way. I'd definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: A. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: Needed new flavorizors for my Weber, and these work perfectly, at a fraction of the cost. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: T. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Used them on a rebuild of a 2007 Weber E-320 and they work great! and what a price! Just do it!
customer_reviews.author: Derek K.

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be a nice upgrade over the rusty Flavorizors they replace
customer_reviews.text: Fit my genesis grill perfectly. Looks to be a nice upgrade over the rusty Flavorizors they replace.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Spychalski

customer_reviews.title: material as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: definitely a martensite material as published. easy to trim to size for my genesis grill. good buy for the money especially if looking at Weber prices!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Stello

customer_reviews.title: but they're out of sight and work just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. A couple of the tents were a little oddly bent, but they're out of sight and work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sure beats the heck out of paying Weber price. Mine came in correct size which was 24.5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: David Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, thin steel
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most other non-Weber bars, these fit just about right width-wise. But they're much closer to 22ga than 20, vs original at 18ga. I'd rather have trimmed them to fit vs the thinner steel but not the end of the world for the price
customer_reviews.author: andy standifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price on a replacement item. They are well made and made my Weber grill like new again!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Zwart Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Two of the bars were significantly scratched, but I believe this will have no impact on their performance.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great and steaks are cooking awesome
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and arrived quickly. Quality is great and steaks are cooking awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Al C.

customer_reviews.title: Works for Weber Genesis
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Weber Genesis perfectly for a much better price than offered by Weber. It's only a week, so I cannot speak to the durability of the product...but I am initially satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Fits grill and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits grill and works as expected. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JIm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were well made and fit perfectly in my Weber grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper and does a great job. I am a grilling God now
customer_reviews.author: Bill T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Measure your grill before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Measure your grill before ordering, I almost ordered the wrong size. Great price for stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Preas

customer_reviews.title: Great heat coming off
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe the heat my grill is kicking off now that I have new flavorizer bars in.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: Made them work for my grill (I need to check length before ordering next time)
customer_reviews.text: This seem pretty decent. I ordered the wrong size though as my grill was listed as compatible and I was too lazy to measure what I needed. Turns out the shorter ones for my grill were more expensive but were lower gauge. These thinner ones seem to do the job though after I attacked them with some metal cutting tools and made them fit. My porcelain enameled plates only lasted about 2 years. Hopefully I get more with these.
customer_reviews.author: W. Angell

customer_reviews.title: Scratches from the factory
customer_reviews.text: The bars arrived neatly packed however when I got them out of the plastic there were scratches on all of them. They fit perfectly. My concerns are that rust will start to form around the scratches. I will update my review after use.
customer_reviews.author: Athladik

customer_reviews.title: You can shave in the stainless finish...at least you can the first day.
customer_reviews.text: I decided it was time to rebuild and upgrade my Weber and this was one of three new things I got for it. These were exactly as expected and look nice the first day, but they got slathered up and now flavorize as they should!
customer_reviews.author: R. English

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look OK. Just put them in. Don't know how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE NOT STAINLESS STEEL.THE ONES I RECEIVED WERE MAGNETIC.STAINLESS IS NON MAGNETIC.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Nola

product_meta.title: Hongso 7539 7540 24.5 Inch Stainless Steel Flavorizer Bars Replacement for Weber Genesis 300 Series E-310, E-320, S-310, S-320 (with Side-Controls Panel) Heat Deflectors 5-Pack 20 Gauge
feature_bullets: Replacement Flavorizer bars for Genesis 300 series gas grills (side-mounted control panel), Genesis E-310 (2007-2010), Genesis E-320 (2007-2010), Genesis S-310 (2007-2010), Genesis S-320 (2007-2010)
Prevents food directly exposure to flame, have a good protection for your burner and make your food more evenly heated.

Product Dimensions: 24.5"(L) x 2.5"(W) x 2.5"(H) Each, 5-Pack, 20 GA., Made of 430 stainless steel. Please kindly note that This stainless steel normally MAGNETIC due to its martensitic structure and iron-content
Make sure you measure the size of your original parts and compare with ours BEFORE you order.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars105 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
